summary:

A new female followers.
CLover by toyomicat.

[/size][color=#999999][size=5]--Requirements--[/size][/color]
[/b][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?][b][size=4]HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT[/size][/b][/url] (Because the use of physics hairstyle)
Optional None HDT hairstyle (Not Requirements)

[/size][color=#999999][size=5]--Body--[/size][/color]
[/b][b][size=4]UNPB and CBBE.

[color=#999999][size=5]--Location--[/size][/color]
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Whiterun The Drunken Huntsman.

[color=#999999][size=5]--Introduction--[/size][/color]
[/size][/b][size=4][b][b][size=4]Standalone followers.
Can marry.
Name - Clover.
[/size][/b][b][size=4]Race - Breton.
Combat Style - Ranger.
[b][size=4]Spells - None Spell.
Perks[/size][/b] - Armsman - Overdraw - Steady hand - Power shot - Savage strike.[/size][/b]

[color=#999999][size=5]--Credits and Thanks--[/size][/color][/b]
